author: Brent D. Griffiths
title: The Trump family just got into the phone business. Here's what we know about how the president makes money
description: Donald Trump's annual financial disclosure shows he made more than $600 million last year.
content:
President Donald Trump's financial disclosure shows he made more than $600 million last year.Dave Chidley/AFP/Getty Images
  • Donald Trump reported making more than $600 million in 2024.
